##Truncated Normal Distribution
#Create Functions
```{r functions}
rmytnorm <- function(x) { 
  
  i<-1
  returndata<-c()
  while (i<=x){
    rnormdata<-rnorm(x*2)
    
    if (rnormdata[i]>0){
      returndata<-append(returndata,rnormdata[i])
      i<-i+1
    }
    
    else if (rnormdata[i]<0) {
      next
    }
    
  }
  return(returndata)
}


dmytnorm<-function(x){
  i<-1
  returndata<-c()
  while (i<=x){
    rnormdata<-rnorm(x*2)
    
    if (rnormdata[i]>0){
      returndata<-append(returndata,rnormdata[i])
      i<-i+1
    }
    
    else if (rnormdata[i]<0) {
      returndata<-append(returndata,0)
    }
    
  }
  return(returndata)
}

```
#rmytnorm
```{r rmytnorm}
res = rmytnorm(1000)
head(res)

hist(res, breaks = 50)
```
#dmytnorm
```{r dmytnorm}
res1 = dmytnorm(-10:10)
res1

plot(-10:10,res1)
```
